meanings.def: to say that you think somebody/something is bad; to say what you do not like or think is wrong about somebody/something
examples: All you ever do is criticize!
criticize somebody/something The decision was harshly criticized by environmental groups.
Journalists who strongly criticize the government can be heavily fined or imprisoned.
criticize somebody/something for something She has been sharply criticized for her comments.
The government has been criticized for not taking the problem seriously.
criticize somebody/something over something The company has been criticized over its handling of the contract.
criticize somebody/something as + adj. The law was widely criticized as racist.
criticize somebody/something as something The project has been criticized as a waste of money.
He was roundly criticized at first.
She has openly criticized the government.
The film was criticized on the grounds that it glorifies violence.
Their record on human rights has been justifiably criticized.

meanings.def: to judge the good and bad qualities of something
examples: We were taught how to criticize poems.
